Package au.csiro.pathling.views.validation

Annotation Interface ValidName

@Pattern(regexp="^[A-Za-z]\\w*$") @Constraint(validatedBy={}) @Target(FIELD) @Retention(RUNTIME) @ReportAsSingleViolation @Documented public @interface ValidName
Validation constraint that ensures a field contains a valid name.

This constraint enforces that the annotated field contains a string that:

  • Starts with a letter (uppercase or lowercase)
  • Contains only letters, numbers, and underscores

This pattern matches the common requirements for identifiers in many programming languages and database systems, ensuring that names are valid across different contexts.

The constraint is implemented using the Pattern annotation with the regular expression ^[A-Za-z]\w*$, which enforces these rules.

Usage example: 

 public class MyClass {
     @ValidName
     private String name;
 }

This constraint is used for validating column names, constant names, and other identifiers throughout the application to ensure they follow a consistent naming convention.

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    Class<?>[]
    groups
    The validation groups this constraint belongs to.
    String
    message
    Error message template to use when the validation fails.
    Class<? extends jakarta.validation.Payload>[]
    payload
    Payload that can be attached to a constraint declaration.

  • Element Details

    • message

      String message
      Error message template to use when the validation fails.

      The default message includes the pattern that the field must match.

      Returns:
      the error message template
      Default:
      "must be a valid name ([A-Za-z]\\w*)"

    • groups

      Class<?>[] groups
      The validation groups this constraint belongs to.
      Returns:
      the validation groups
      Default:
      {}

    • payload

      Class<? extends jakarta.validation.Payload>[] payload
      Payload that can be attached to a constraint declaration.
      Returns:
      the payload
      Default:
      {}
